about_the_game:
"2D Dogfight - World War II (Eastern Front and Pacific)" DLC includes the following 35 Aircrafts:

B-25J Mitchell
F4F-4 Wildcat
F6F-5 Hellcat
F4U-1A Corsair
F4U-1C Corsair
F4U-4 Corsair
SBD-3 Dauntless

IL-2 1941
IL-2 1943
IL-10
LaGG-3
La-5FN
La-7
MiG-3
P-39N-1
P-63C-1
Tu-2S
Yak-1
Yak-3
Yak-9T
Yak-9U

A6M2 Zero
A6M5 Zero
A7M2 Reppu
B5N2 Kate
D3A1 Val
D4Y1 Suisei
G4M1 Hamaki
J2M3 Raiden
Ki-43-II Hayabusa
Ki-44-II otsu Shoki
Ki-61-I hei Hien
Ki-84-I ko Hayate
Ki-84-I hei Hayate
N1K2-J Shiden KAI

Players who purchase this DLC can use these aircrafts in custom game and online game.

8 new missions in the Campaign mode (4 for Allies and 4 for Axis).

In addition, players who purchase the DLC can also get the exclusive menu wallpaper and orange theme UI of "World War II (Eastern Front and Pacific)"
